Package edu.umass.cs.msocket.common.policies

mSocket proxy policies to choose a proxy when creating an MServerSocket

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlackBoxWritingPolicy  
    ChunkInformation  
    ContigousWritingPolicy  
    DefaultProxyPolicy
    This class defines a DefaultProxyPolixy that picks a random proxy in the GNS.
    FixedProxyPolicy
    This class defines a Fixed Proxy Policy where the user can specify himself a list of IP addresses of well-known proxies to use.
    FullDuplicationWritingPolicy
    This class defines a FullDuplicationWritingPolicy This policy writes a chunk on both the paths.
    GeoLoadProxyPolicy
    This class defines a mixed proxy selection policy based on load and geolocation
    GeolocationProxyPolicy
    This class defines a GeolocationProxyPolicy
    MultipathSchedulerInterface
    This class defines the interface of the multipath policy scheduler
    MultipathWritingPolicy
    This class defines the parent class for different multipath write policies
    NoProxyPolicy
    This class defines a policy that does not use a Proxy.
    ProxySelectionPolicy
    This class defines options to specify the user preference when choosing a proxy.
    RandomProxyPolicy
    This class defines a RandomProxyPolicy
    RoundRobinMultipathScheduler  
    RoundRobinWritingPolicy  
    RTTBasedWritingPolicy
    This class implements RTT based scheduling policy.

Package edu.umass.cs.msocket.common.policies Description

mSocket proxy policies to choose a proxy when creating an MServerSocket
